notes.text: We now ensure that the sorting and removal of table columns work correctly
We now ensure that the value help with conditional Common.ValueListForValidation annotation works correctly
You can now use SAP Fiori tools in adaptation projects to adapt the navigation properties in the filter bar
You can now specify function names for beforeRebindTable and selectionChange events in tables used in an adaptation project
You can now specify the sideEffectsEventsInteractionType value in a list report used in an adaptation project
We now correctly evaluate the complex expression for the FieldControl annotations
You can now specify the additionalSemanticObject value in an object page used in an adaptation project
We now provide a context menu for tree tables
We’ve resolved an issue where values selected from the value help could not be removed in the group view of the Adapt Filters dialog
We now correctly translate the header form label of an object page and the data fields in field groups of line items
You can now use buttons in the tree table toolbar to move a selected node before its previous sibling or after its next sibling
We’ve resolved an issue where the multi-input field did not appear
We now ensure that fields with currencies based on an integer value work correctly in edit mode
You can now use extended ‘TO’ and ‘FROM’ filters with single date operators in the Save as Tile option and xApp state scenarios
We now ensure that columns with a defined scale are exported correctly
We have now added the description property to the FieldAPI
In a tree table, you can now show newly created nodes at the position computed by the back end, for example by taking sorting into account
Input fields with value help now have description binding to a JSON model using a description attribute
We now display an appropriate message when a subset of rows is updated in the mass edit dialog
You can now disable the Editing Status filter field in the list report page of draft enabled applications
We now ensure that the Discard Draft popover is shown correctly when the browser window is resized to a smaller size
We’ve resolved an issue with showing custom filter fields in the Adapt Filters dialog
We now consider the intent parameters of  SAP Fiori launchpad while displaying the title with a primary action as a link in the quick view
We've resolved an issue that led to unnecessary update of fields when opened with mass edit dialog
We now display an appropriate message when no changes are made in the mass edit dialog
We've now enhanced the control IDs for data points considering the parent view
You can now specify the operation grouping mode for mass edit changes in the manifest
We now ensure that side effects are applied on radio buttons
We now add additional field binding information for fields with TextArrangement set to TextOnly, to avoid adding a field twice when using key user adaptation
We now ensure that a table with a custom column shows data in an adaptation project
You can now specify which fields can be included or excluded from the Mass Edit dialog
We've resolved an issue where a table didn't load properly due to undefined binding contexts
We now ensure that accessibility is correctly set for the fields in edit mode using collaborative draft feature
We now ensure that the ExcludeFromNavigationContext annotation works correctly with links as well
Value is now marked as selected in value help on the list report
We now ensure that the MultiValue fields don't create additional requests in display mode
We’ve resolved an issue where design-time changes caused errors on overview pages
